named-query.name: Tournament.findPlayers
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM Player p, Tournament t WHERE t.id = :id AND p MEMBER OF t.opponents

named-query.name: Tournament.countPlayers
named-query.query: SELECT count(p) FROM Player p, Tournament t WHERE t.id = :id AND p MEMBER OF t.opponents

named-query.name: Tournament.findSquads
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM Squad s, Tournament t WHERE t.id = :id AND s MEMBER OF t.opponents

named-query.name: Tournament.countSquads
named-query.query: SELECT count(s) FROM Squad s, Tournament t WHERE t.id = :id AND s MEMBER OF t.opponents

named-query.name: Tournament.findOpponents
named-query.query: SELECT o FROM Opponent o, Tournament t WHERE t.id = :id AND o MEMBER OF t.opponents

named-query.name: Tournament.findDisciplines
named-query.query: SELECT d FROM Discipline d, Tournament t WHERE t.id = :id AND d MEMBER OF t.disciplines
